review_body: Blocks spam, but not if they‚Äôre collection agencies! I got this app, TrueCaller, and its only works part of the time.  Understanding there are constantly new numbers added to the spam list, I expect to update the app database daily.  Not that big of a deal.  The problem is, it clearly identifies a spam caller, but still allows some through.  I have found it blocks legitimate spam calls as I recently put my resume online and immediately began getting spam calls.  I bought the new iPhone X 256GB, but neglected to turn the blocking options on in settings.  Once that was done, no more spam calls... or so I thought.   The calls I was receiving, promising job opportunities, required me to sign up for more school.  Holding two bachelors and a masters degrees, I politely told the first few I had no interest in school and explained my education level.  If you refuse their persistence in signing up for school, they rudely say they can‚Äôt help.   Truecaller stopped these.  However, while clearly marked in red a call is spam and you answer, you will find they let collection agency calls through.  I‚Äôve had my number for 10 years now and still get collection calls for someone I don‚Äôt know!   I haven‚Äôt found any better app out there, though, so the collection calls will have to manually be rejected.

WORTHLESS MAIN BENEFIT IS ALLOWS REPORTING OF A SPAMMER - GEE THANKS I find the app worthless, and the cost to privacy not near worth the price of giving the developers FULL ACCESS TO EVERY SINGLE CONTACT ON YOUR DEVICE.  There are two main benefits to this app.  One, is to allow you to report a spam caller as a spammer to the developer - Gee Thanks (can you hear the sarcasm dripping in my voice?).  Two, allows you to double check a number that has just phone you, to see if other app holders have previously reported the number as a Spammer.  Really do not understand the near five star review average, in fact I‚Äôm baffled by it.  Someone, please explain to me how this is not a worthless app.

Wrong for many reasons We had an issue with someone on Craigslist who tried to get personal information from us.  We hung up on him.  Shortly afterwards we learned that our phone number was listed as a scam on Trucaller, probably as retribution from the Craigslist scammer.  We learned about our phone number being listed as a scam from a local pet grooming shop when they saw it was listed on Trucaller.  Trucaller never bothered to check that we had the same phone number since 2001, nor did they check our home address, nor did they contact us before labeling us as scammers.  When we finally contacted them, they removed our number from their list. Maybe you should check with them to find out if someone has given them your number out of spite.  This is a dangerous violation of privacy for them to convict people in a way for the whole world to see without any proof at all, just some jerk reporting you.  The Nazis and Soviets had the same kind of system where you could rat on a neighbor and they would disappear!

DUDEEEEeeeee It‚Äôs awesome I thought it wasn‚Äôt going to work but it immediately turned all those spam calls into red lettered SPAM. I get spam called all day long at school ONLY AT SCHOOL I‚Äôve literally never got spam called at home but at school I get so embarrassed when my ringtone goes off super loud in the middle of class one day it literally happened 3 TIMES i turn my ringer off but the stuff in my backpack shoves my phone all around and one time even ended up calling the cops on accident because of the side buttons. They literally were like ‚ÄúCan the person with the phone number (blah) bla - blah come down to the office IMMEDIATELY.‚Äù I was like üò± but yeah my phone causes problems but this app can fix em so :3

Need consistent, frequent app store updates Love the idea of this app and really appreciate it. It seems to work well at blocking spam callers, HOWEVER, I hate that it doesn‚Äôt automatically update on its own; notify you when there‚Äôs a new update available; or even show up in the app store to show there‚Äôs an update. As a result, I still get spam calls more than I should because they are not included until I go open the app, check if there‚Äôs an update, and then initiate it myself. Imagine if we had to do this with all apps? That would be obnoxious. I really hope we can get regular/frequent app updates for this via the app store so we dont have to constantly go in this app and check ourselves. It would save time and stress.

NOT True Caller... After adding the app, my spam calls increased considerably. Apparently, the app sold my phone number.  In 2 weeks, only 1 call was considered spam by the App when I started receiving over a dozen calls per day. I had to turn the ringer off and ignored the calls I didn‚Äôt recognize. I called back some of the ‚Äúmissed calls‚Äù and all of the numbers were for non-existent lines.  Apparently, the numbers appearing on the calls were randomly generated from non-existent lines.  Most of those numbers attempted to be from areas where my number originally came from.  I no longer live nor communicate with people with numbers from the area my number originated from, but kept the same number because I‚Äôve had it since the brick phones of the early 90s. I don‚Äôt know what True solutions are out there to resolve the spam calls issue which has now gotten worse.

Uploaded my contacts to their database and made all public I loved this app. I don't know to how many friends I suggested it over the years. I've been one of the early adopters and have been a huge fan. It blocks spam quite effectively.

They uploaded my contacts list to their database I loved this app. I don't know to how many friends I suggested it over the years. I've been one of the early adopters and have been a huge fan. It blocks spam quite effectively.

App is worthless now I used to love this app, and used to tell everyone I know to download it because of how well it blocked spam calls and gave you excellent caller ID. I work in wireless, and used to tell all my customers about it as well. However, in the last 12-18 months it's slowly but surely been going downhill, and now it's completely worthless. It literally blocks no spam calls anymore, doesn't give me any caller ID, and the number lookup took finds absolutely zero names of people or businesses. I will be deleting as soon as I'm done writing my review. I had always considered this a 5 star app, but now if I could rate it 0 stars, unfortunately I would.

Saved contacts I would have lost upgrading my phone. I am very glad I installed True Caller on my last phone and now this phone because when I upgraded to an Apple phone I had trouble transferring everything and wound up with only a portion of my contact list.

Great app but not so good on IOS Although, it doesn‚Äôt work like it is on the Androids, but it comes handy whenever  I need to check unknown numbers , and there it works at about 98% on all numbers , however I didn't grant the app permission to my contacts anymore because the first time I did, it loaded my contacts with strange numbers called spams, I wouldn't want to scroll through numbers I didn't save in my contact, so  I deleted all those numbers, and  simply denied the app the permission and there after use it in an isolating mode.

Worse than the problem it purports to solve Once this app is on your phone a red screen will pop up saying ‚ÄòSPAM‚Äô every time someone on their list calls. This isn‚Äôt often - it only blocks a fraction of unwanted calls - but you will always know about it when a spam call comes in. Infuriating! I don‚Äôt want to be notified when a spam call comes in - I want it blocked before my phone goes off!!!
Works - sort of... The fact that the spam database has to be updated daily is a huge setback. I have to manually open the app and click update every day or otherwise spam calls go through. Why?
Newbe Haven't had this app long enough to properly review it, but it's bugging me for a review right off the bat! So this is what they get till I use it.

No longer effective I have used Truecaller for the past 3 years. It was great at identifying mystery numbers, especially those reported by other users as spam. It was integrated into my phone, stopping blocked calls before they rang. And the database updated quickly every time the app was opened. Deservedly, it was picked up by reviewers as an effective tool. But for the last 5 mont, the app has been totally useless. It does not update its database on opening, and updating it manually is very, very slow. It rarely finds the numbers calling me and no longer blocks them. Short story is that it was once a 5-star app and now is a 2-star app. I'm moving on to something else. What happened, Truecaller - did fame go to your head?

Increased Spam/Robo Calls My number is registered under the National Do Not Call list so I rarely used to receive spam, marketing or calls (switchboard) calls. However, since installing and using this app, I‚Äôve gotten at least one spam call per day ‚Äî sometimes three. After some investigating, I read other app users are having a similar experience regarding this app‚Äôs privacy policy. It‚Äôs almost as if the app is catering to spammers by providing them with your info.

I love this app I‚Äôve had this app for a couple years now and I very seldom receive spam calls. To be sure, the more often I open the app and click the little shield icon (spam id) at bottom right of screen to click on ‚Äúcheck for updates‚Äù, the better it works. I open the app several times a week to be sure I‚Äôm protected by following these steps. So it‚Äôs an app that you will need to frequently manually refresh, but it takes only a few seconds to do. Easy Peazy! Highly recommend!
DON'T INSTALL THIS APP!!! I've registered my phone number to the National Do Not Call Registry and I was getting a couple spam calls per month.

Not as good as it was at first. Loved this app at first, but now it doesn‚Äôt identify most numbers as it did in the beginning. Now I just get a message- the truth is out there, search the web, when I try to find info on the caller. Then you have to pay another company to get the info. I am a paid member of Truecaller, but I am about to cancel. I have now downloaded RoboKiller and it works great, even let‚Äôs you use one of their bots for answering or make your own, and recording the call. However, if it is spam or robo call, your phone does Not even ring which is wonderful, you can check on your own without interruptions.

Puts you in control. The app does as promised. It blocks already flagged number. If you decide it‚Äôs not a flagged number, it give you the option to unblock. The best feature in my opinion is the community input. If you report a number, it takes note of this and then the next time someone reports it, it will show how many community members have already flagged the number. You are able to the same with text messages. Also, it creates a contact list labeled SPAM with all the fraudulent already verified number.

Sketchy privacy policy! Ironic given the nature of the app. Truecaller is actually an Indian company or at least they funnel your data through an Indian she'll company if you are a non EU user. I'm guessing this let's them do sketchier things with the data they collect when you install this app like your contact info and the people in your phone book etc. Their privacy policy also says they will use your contact info to send you targeted advertisements etc. Kind of ironic given this app is supposed to help protect your privacy and reduce spam calls. Just goes to show you never know what you're getting until you read the rules. Surprised apple allows this on the app store. Cue: defensive response from developer in 3..2..1..

author_name: my last try at a nickname
review_body: Uhm, fail. Worked great in the beginning. Unfortunately the last 10 spam calls were not identified as the call comes through. After each update, the blicking function has to be turned in again in iOS. Why? Just got 2 calls, from same spam number, but only the number is shown - no spam info. So I checked - turned on under phone settings. Copied number, swiped right to widget - zero info except 'Tap here to get started' (or something like that). Opened App, pasted number in search field and oh my, over 1500 reports of spam in the exact same number, yet it failed to display this when the call came through...? And yes, the app database was up to date!

Really happy about it Truecaller has relieved me from all the scam callers that call repeatedly. I have got scam after scam call for years. But with Truecaller I can finally stop getting repeated calls from the same person. If I wish to know if someone is a scam caller I can type their number in too. Usually it will say scam caller and tell you want they want. I would highly recommend it. It is affordable and gets better constantly.

Good... when it works:  INCONSISTENT Used to work consistently, but does not any longer.  I update database regularly, have software turned on to screen, yet the spam/scam calls keep getting through.  I immediate check the app w/the copy/paste feature, and number is already in the system listed as ‚Äúscammer.‚Äù  Why is the software not catching these calls as they come in?!  WHY AM I TAKING UP STORAGE SPACE WITH THIS APP IF ITS NOT WORKING?!?!

No Free Version Don‚Äôt bother to download this unless you want a subscription. There are no free features to use and you can only try the app after giving them your credit card info. Most of the other available apps have a free service and offer a premium upgrade at a cost but I‚Äôm not paying before I‚Äôve tried the service at all especially not 100 a year for the discounted service. This app should say that it‚Äôs a subscription service in the description because it‚Äôs deceptive that it is a free download that has nothing free in it. Also, I don‚Äôt trust anyone who forces third party billing, apps should be charged through the App Store and I should not have to enter my cc into an app. Shady.

Makes Default Phone App Lag Warns when the Red Cross calls about blood drives. Does not block spam calls from local (hijacked) numbers. Ad-supported. Must access your contact list. Not sure what they do with your contacts. Truecaller puts a huge database of Spam numbers into a couple of contacts which make the phone app lag horribly whenever you have a recent call or voicemail from any of those numbers. The contacts app also lags when you try to view the contact Truecaller generates. This app is supposed to make your life better. IMO, it is worse than not having spam filters at all.

Still having to block spam/scammers While Truecaller will identify a caller as spam IF you put it into their app it does nothing for the ten plus illegitimate calls I receive daily. Nor does it block spam messages, which I get frequently, though by no means as often as calls. Also, reporting/plugging the number into the app and blocking there does not actually BLOCK the calls. Truecaller has proven to be like all the other so called apps that block scammers. ‚ÄúPlug the number in and we‚Äôll block it...‚Äù ‚ÄúWe‚Äôll identify scammers and block them...‚Äù so far a big pile of steaming BULLSPIT (you all know what I‚Äôm really saying.) Not only does it not work but I get notifications all the time telling me to support them by upgrading to premium. So glad I didn‚Äôt.

Worthless, Scammer Themselves Listed as a free application, but upon digging further you discover that‚Äôs untrue.  It‚Äôs absolutely worthless.  Hasn‚Äôt done a thing about intercepting and labeling robocalls.  The basic premise of their system is flawed.  It counts upon building a database (to share) of all numbers that are telemarketing numbers.  YOU GUYS ARE LATE TO THE PARTY.  The scammers are merely blocking calls with Call Blocker and then displaying a number of their choice that may or may not be active.  There are clearly nearly an infinite number of these numbers.  One time my girlfriend got called by HER OWN NUMBER as they attempted to get her to answer her phone.  TRU CALLER doesn‚Äôt work‚Äîbut they‚Äôll charge you a couple hundred bucks a year for what should be a free service by your provider.

Has yet to block one single call I receive 3-4 robocalls a day from different numbers and thought I would give this app a chance. I've now had it for a few months and can say it has failed to block ANY of these calls. I thought it would block at least a few of them but nope. So far every single spam call I receive still comes through with no problems. I report every single one but because they spoof different numbers they just keep on coming! I'm just happy I didn't pay for the app since it appears they rely on us to report these issues for them instead of them proactively blocking the spoofed calls.

Good but could be better I‚Äôve had Truecaller for over a year as a recommendation from my sister. I recommended it to my daughters and neighbors. It seems to block a few spam (2 or3) callers each day however plenty get through. My phone rings alllll day. Also my phone rings several times before Truecaller identifies a call as spam. Numbers I look up have NEVER BEEN IDENTIFIED! Just the carrier which is nothing. Why can‚Äôt all number be identified and why do we have to PAY for better spam blocking when calls still get through .
Absolutely Useless tl;dr Don‚Äôt believe the hype. Bite the bullet and get NoMoRobo, you really get what you pay for.

Better Than Nothing; Leaves A Lot to be Desired Works irregularly, and if I‚Äôm getting what I know is a Spam call but one that‚Äôs not in the True Caller database, I‚Äôm unable to submit the number to True Caller‚Äôs database though it‚Äôs obvious spam. Frustrating!

Recent version loses features and usefulness I was thrilled with this app when I first downloaded couple years ago. Now it doesn‚Äôt auto load the number that just called or I copied as it used to. I literally have checked over 30 numbers with no results at all. It has also become very difficult to tag a spammer. A very useful app has become a waste of space on my phone as I get 3 to 4 spam calls a day and this app no longer recognizes any of them where before it would identify at least 75% of them previously.

üòè This app used to be good. Before when you copy number to search, it will automatically ask you to paste and search it. After some kind of update on the app this feature has stopped working and you will have to copy and paste then search manually. In addition they won‚Äôt find the name for the number you searching for like they do before. It‚Äôs kind of annoying. I wish they bring back the old version.

Used to be better; some features taken out Used to be better six months ago, seemed to catch calls pretty well.  Now, it barely catches anything.  Definitely not paying for pro now if it doesn‚Äôt work, plus the below issues:

Can‚Äôt be uninstalled? I installed this app, then uninstalled it after a couple months because it is incapable of stopping callers with spoofed caller ID numbers (which is 99% of spam calls anymore). BUT truecaller is still screening my calls, even though I‚Äôve uninstalled it! I know this because I actually got a call from a legit telemarketer today with a non-spoofed caller ID and the red truecaller screen came up. I checked in Settings and the App Store and there is no indication that truecaller is still installed or that it has permission to screen my calls. But it is anyway. I guess I may have to reset my phone to get rid of this thing.

Beware: You may lose voice mails I used this app for a few months.  During that time, I had a number of people tell me they called, left voice mail messages which I never received. I deleted the app, but messages continued to be lost. I Googled ‚Äúyou call voice mail‚Äù and found an article of the company‚Äôs webpage stating that deleting the app was not enough to stop voice mail from going to their service. However, I was never notified I had voice mail. You need to take an additional four or five more steps to completely delete your account. I felt this was dishonest, and the app felt like a scam to me. I suggest you avoid.

I wish it worked.... Ive had Trucaller for a year.  I get two or three spam calls a day, usually robos. Only 10 percent are ‚Äòblocked‚Äô - that is my display shows it as a spam call.  Another 20 percent are allowed through but when i search the number in Trucaller it shows as spam (red), but I was NOT alerted when the call came in. Another 30 percent of the calls are found in the database as being reported but there is no alert, no indication of it being spam.  The rest are new to Trucaller.  One last complaint - Trucaller allows numbers to come through with no alert that I have already reported and ‚Äòblocked‚Äô. !
Have Premium --- Disapointment I used to recommend Truecaller all the time.

Garbage product, non-paid version does not work This product really is garbage and a waste of your time to install..... the numbers I search are never found. There are so many useful products of this type available, and many of those work great. This developer has really missed the mark, product should not offer a free version if it does nothing to prevent/identify spam. They do offer a paid version, starting at $2.99 per month, which I did not try in light of the fact that they first wasted much of time with the free (useless) version. I wish them luck!

Only lacking 1 thing... For the most part, I love this app... but there is 1 thing I wish they would fix. I don‚Äôt often have a number that I need to look up, but when I do some of them have no information (mostly on cell phone numbers). Hopefully this gets fixed... soon... because the last unknown cell I answered turned out not to be a customer, but a very... strange individual.

Run it in the background all always I don't have any problems with this but some of the complaints sound like what my partner had when his settings weren't giving the app enough access. He was getting red "spam" labeled calls; I was getting nothing. I  didn't know anything was happening until I looked through custom labeled calls.

Useful but can be better in so many ways Cannot mark an incoming call as spam unless its already there in their system. When you get a spam robo call and you copy and paste it all you get is analyze your contacts screen. Please have a way to mark or enter spam calls manually. The system scans your contacts if you give it permission and lets the whole world know about name of your contact when that number is searched by anyone.

author_name: Bad Actor Get Your Grove On!
review_body: Are you responsible for the increase in spam I‚Äôm receiving? I installed this application two weeks ago just to see what it was about. After looking at the features for a few minutes I uninstalled it. Now I‚Äôm receiving all kinds of spam messages something I‚Äôve never had a problem with before. Did you sell my number? Do you spam app installers so they subscribe to your product?  Yesterday I received a text from someone that included a suggestive picture of a woman. Never have I received spam like this before. Now I‚Äôm wondering if you have something to do with it!

Good & helpful, but... If you have a phone number in your phone contacts & you want to know the owner of it, it will not gives you the right information, it picks the data of your phone only, this should be modified so I can see the other names of the number I'm searching for, one more thing, it‚Äôs tilting too much nowadays, very slow & can‚Äôt type the numbers normally

Too many problems The app is great for the most part. 8/10 times it will give you the name for whatever number you search and identifies spam. However, the app itself has severe problems. It does not connect. It has been saying problem with connection for a week now. While there isn‚Äôt an issue with the connection but the app instead. It is frustrating that you can‚Äôt search because the app itself has issues.

Going downhill Update: I‚Äôm done and deleting the app. It hasn‚Äôt identified a call as spam in weeks and yet when I share the number with the app it‚Äôs labeled spam or ‚Äúhealth insurance scam‚Äù or something similar. This app is no different than just blocking each number on your phone after they come in. Do not be suckered by the high reviews. They‚Äôre fake or old.

Ease of use and efficiency Truecaller has definitely given me my sanity back. I only use it as a free service so I‚Äôm not really taking advantage of everything they have to offer but it‚Äôs working fantastically. I‚Äôm really enjoying the ability to enter a phone number and find out what it is to report it or save it and that‚Äôs just so easy to do so I think them very much

Not delivering its promise I‚Äôve had this app months now for awhile it was working but ever since the past updates the promise of blocking of spam/scam calls has been broken. Calls getting through has drop none to weekly to daily now. Whats even worse the calls getting through are sometimes the ones I‚Äôve blocked and others base in data so my trust on this app is very close to non existent so unfortunately I can‚Äôt say I recommend this app in fact I feel this app is a scam to forcefully buy premium and telling how the maker of this app really fill the gap of rich/pay and poor/freedom.

Works well I have used this app for many years and been fairly satisfied with it except for one thing. I been retired for longer than I had the privilege of using this app and suspect with many users especially those of us who had to retire early for medical or similar reasons there is no way we can afford the subscription fees for this. Thankfully, we can use this to some degree for free. I hope this does not end or

Scammer‚Äôs App What calls come through regardless when you use this app. This is a scam now people that have been trying to track me down now have my address and phone number. And block calls now come through even though they say SPAM on them and they are blocked on my Apple phone. Don‚Äôt use this app it‚Äôs a rip off and I set up to steal your information. Now all of a sudden all creditors have my number and are still able to get through my phone.

Update diminished service The July 30 update diminished the service. Received two calls not marked as spam yet they each had over 50 spam reports after I typed in the number.  It used to know the number that just came in when I went to true call right after.  Now I can't copy and paste have to type in number.  I had been recommending it but until it gets back to where it was I won't.

As of recent hasn‚Äôt been blocking So far so good when I first downloaded this 5 months ago but in the last month it hasn‚Äôt updated the list of blocked calls and again I‚Äôm starting to get random calls. Maybe there are scam callers out there who are smart enough to get through your flag signatures. Please please update the block list again it was going well until recently where it was no longer blocking spam and scam callers.

I already have over 300 (blocked by myself) scamner calls over the past couple of years. calls I followed directions to set up the app on calls and texts. Six scam calls still came through untouched by TrueCaller yesterday and five scam calls  today untouched by TrueCaller. I deleted the app in less than 24 hours of use.

Works..... Works well to a point. Most of the time I end up copying the number and Truecaller does a great search. Then I google who that company/ person is then decide whether or not it‚Äôs spam. I‚Äôm using the free app.... so.... can‚Äôt ask for much more. It does block known spam numbers and will block and report numbers you add. So.... I‚Äôd download this app for free again!

Used to be great I‚Äôve had this app for a long time now and it used to be a great way to see who was calling, but in the past year or so the developers seem to be more interested in turning this into a social media and advertising app than actually making it do what it is supposed to.  Shame, because it was such a great app before.

Helpful, sort of I‚Äôm beginning to think this app loses performance as you use it and decline to update to the paid version. There are many numbers that my AT&T spam identification app. Initially, most of the numbers who called me were identified by Truecaller. Now, 1 in 5 are appropriately identified. More and more requests to start paying for an ‚Äòimproved‚Äô service, less and less effective in identifying the bad guys. I‚Äôd be inclined to pay them the extra if not for this. :(

Inconsistent I had a difficult time trying to rate this app. I guess it deserves a 2.5. I wonder if the premium edition gets rid of the bugs.   Somehow all the numbers I get called by are mobile phone and in order to find out any other information, you have to pay to get a full report. During the past 18 months, I have had the app, it ID‚Äôd one number as spam and it turned out to be one of my doctors offices!

Not impressed I got Truecaller a few years ago and when I first got it, it was awesome. I could plug in an unknown number and it would tell me who it belonged to most of the time. Now, the numbers are always unknown and just give me the cellphone carrier or tell me if the number has been reported as spam. It does not do what it used to do and I find the app rather worthless to me these days. I still get spam calls so it doesn‚Äôt block them all - and it never tells me anymore who the unknown numbers belong to.

Waste of money Downloaded on iPhone XR and could not get the spam phone numbers to load meanwhile getting bombarded by Robo callers I reached out to customer support and Shawn took 9 days to respond to me. I had followed his instructions but still no luck. I reached out to him again as I had prepaid the year and was told you have 3 days to cancel after purchase. Are you for real??? I thought when I bought this app it was installed and working but when calls kept on coming in I reached out. Truecaller took 9days to respond on first email. Not a reputable company to deal with
Doesn‚Äôt work I‚Äôve sat on this review for a couple weeks now.

The difference You can block callers on your iPhone if they persistently leave no message. But, with Truecaller, you not only get confirmation they‚Äôre scammers and you can share, the network expands to help others and you get visual indicators when they are blocked so you know you‚Äôre being protected.

Latest Update Breaks the Ability To Update Spammer Database After downloading the latest update, I am unable to hit the button to download the new spammer database. Tapping the button does nothing, and half of the time the ‚Äúspam id‚Äù icon on the bottom bar disappears entirely, leaving a blank white space that you can still click on for some reason, but which still won‚Äôt let you update anything. The latest version has bugs and I will have to wait for them to be fixed before raising my rating again

Doesn‚Äôt block as effectively as I‚Äôd hoped I will say that after downloading this app the amount of scam calls that came through dropped, which is why I give it a 3-star rating. However, I wish it would update my scam list automatically. I forget to update so scam calls creep through the cracks. I still get around 1-2 scam calls a day, which is less than before but it‚Äôs still enough to be inconvenient.

Nice app but... I have installed this app a year ago and that was doing well until last a few months it stoped working. I updated the app and still not working until i removed it once and installed again today! Still working! Hope it will be long

Depressed app Pleased don't force me to give my phone number to register my access to this application, take it or leave it this is not the good way to behave with the users. Update your app and change this silly option, if still the same I‚Äôll remove it after a while.

Unblock my Number I have been getting SPAM calls from numbers from +972 and +970 since October 2018. On my whatapp and viver and even direct calls. I have blocked 300+ numbers so far. And still get harrased daily by these people. They have listed my number on TrueCaller as Spammer by 110 people. Who are Ofcourse the spammers.

True caller True caller is a very helpful app in my opinion because you can easily know who‚Äôs calling you by just typing in the number. It has helped me a lot and had also helped me identify scammers and keep my phone protected.i have never seen an app like this before. Thank you true caller for your help!

Truecaller no longer works! So now, after having Truecaller for several years, I see you‚Äôre trying to force me into upgrading by not completing the update. Interesting Information I had some unknown numbers on my phone. The first one was an answering machine. The second was a number that said not accepting calls at this time. I looked it up and got a name which led me to the we and another number and address a few blocks from me. I called the number and got voicemail. When I began explaining the situation, the caller  got onto the phone and asked me what was this about. He was very suspicious and I did more searching to find he's a security guard. This is all to strange. I've had a lot of suspicious activity around my home recently and it makes me wonder with 3 unknown calls today, if I need to research more. At least this gave me a heads up of suspicious activity coming my way from my neighborhood. The coincidences are too obvious to just turn a blind eye to them. Kinda makes a person feel paranoid. I hate that feeling.  Thanks to this app, I have some grounds to the recent activity around my home that may link this caller to the event.

Worst app ever! I would not even give this app one star, but obviously I have to. This is by far the worst app I have ever installed. I thought it would do some good but all it does is attract spammers to call your phone so the stupid app can tell you that it's a spammer. The day I installed it, within minutes I had already received a spammer. A another one called not even 5 min later, 3 minutes, 2 minutes and so on. Always unknown numbers.  This repeated itself for at least 15 times in less than 2 hours. Well enough of this, I deleted it. It's funny  how 4 days went by and I have not received one spam call since. I really did not get a whole lot before I installed it. Maybe one or two a week. I just thought I would try it out, worst mistake ever. I will never install another spam caller app on my phone again. I just will simply not answer like I normally do. However if a spam call becomes frequent, I will infact answer, give them a piece of my mind and tell them I don't give a crap of what they want or are trying to sell me. I am not falling for their scam and hang up. No one should have to deal with these scammers and I would hope no one falls for their trick. At the same time, this app needs to be perminently removed from the app store. I like how you can block numbers that show up, however, I don't like how you can not block unknowns. There should be a way where they can not block their number and if they try to, the call simply will not go through. Thank you.

App has too many problems, no indication of spam caller when they call, no background Spam updates This app needs a lot of improvements. When a known spammer calls, there is no indication that it is a spammer during the call. To be safe, you let all calls roll over to voicemail, unless you recognize the number. When you go to look up the number, you find that the call was a indeed a spammer, with multiple incidents. Also, there is no or infrequent background updates to the Spam Id list. Every time

Great App Trusted When I first got a IPhone 2 years ago I was looking for a app just like this, due to my blackberry had numerous apps that offered this feature. I have been using TRUECALLER since then best on the market can always count on this app to block the spam callers. Then stop because FYI your number is listed on the internet cell phone, landline etc. Use the app and do research before making accusations of being afraid to verify your own number because with one click you can be found online, even if your on a DNC. ***** Bravo TRUECALLER for service provided.

Amazing app This app is great.  It could be ultimate, but it only has one flaw.  It uses human technology as the basis to protect against a sometimes automated "robo-call". I paid about $15 or so to protect my landline using a tele-zapper, which can still be found on auction sites.  If true caller would incorporate that technology into their cellular app, I can easily envision myself paying $1 per year for that option.  Just like 911 needs .95 a month to operate, a tax of 8 cents a month to fund the elimination of spam callers would definitely make sense.....(let me cut & paste to app help so someone might read this and MAKE BANK!!)

Good app, but hard to keep up with ever-changing spammers This app mainly adds known (reported by users) spammer numbers to your address book, so when you get a call from a known spammer, you see a big red "spammer" caller ID picture. It also provides a very easy way to check numbers and report spammers/scammers.

Does what it says First, the people who have stated that it does not block phone calls are correct.  Apple does not allow access to the phone to that degree.  So how can this help you, you may ask?  It is easy, go  into contacts, find ‚ÄúIdentified as Spam‚Äù and edit the settings for that contact.  Set the vibrate to none and then you will have to find a ring tone that is silent.  They are all over the internet, DO NOT PAY FOR ONE.  You can look to find how easy it is to make a Ringtone using iTunes and then set the silent ringtone to the contact Identified as Spam.  Now when a number calls you that is listed in TrueCaller, it won‚Äôt ring or vibrate.  You will only know they called when you are looking at your call history or notifications.  This is a great app.

More spam calls then ever I've had the app about a month or 2 and I've actually gotten more spam calls then ever! I get about 2-3 spam calls per day now all from different phone numbers. Before installing the app I rarely had spam calls. Yes the app has a list of a few hundred known spam phone numbers, which it adds as 1 contact in your phone book and blocks that contact, but I think it might cause the millions of unidentified numbers to get ahold of your phone number to call you.

It really works!! Installed this app only a week ago. Had been receiving minimum of 6-8 calls every single day. It's only been a week of me reporting (super easily) each phone call and Ive now noticed I'm not getting any soliciting calls!

How to use TrueCaller I deleted this app before the 7.0 upgrade due to privacy concerns with the dialer function, but I'm downloading it again. Why? It actually does filter out spam callers. But you have to do a little work on your end to make it do that. The way you make truecaller effective is to scroll allllllll the way down to the "Identified As Spam" contact it loads into your contacts and tap "Block This Caller". That's using your iPhone's built in call blocker AND truecaller's spam database together. It's cumbersome, especially since you have to manually update the Spam ID list within the truecaller app (annoying), but in the months since I deleted the app the calls have increased, I suspect because I haven't been updating that blocked caller list. I'll see if fiddling with the settings in app will alleviate my privacy concerns. Probably better than nothing.

A waste.  We should all be refunded. As others have stated you look it up and it says that 300 people reported it as spam yet it doesn't block the call or warn you. One person stated that Apple does not allow call blockers. Then why are they selling this. You can do just as much by using Apples block contact feature. Amazingly though that feature does not work on the identified as spam contact made with this app. The call, if in your database, just lights up red when it rings. And why doesn't it add to the identified as spam list automatically each day?  If I have to add it manually by sharing it with Truecaller first, then what is the point of the app?  The potential is there but the implementation is poor. If that is all Apple allows then it should not be in the market. At the very least it should not be a paid service. I am considering reporting this to the better business bureau to see what they have to say

The best $0.99 I ever spent Filters a TON of spam calls.  The only ones it has trouble with are the callers who spam your local number.  You do need to update it very frequently to get the current spam list because it changes so much not because of them.  Improve your life $0.99 right now.  Either that or believe you are a Nigerian prince with $1 billion in a Swiss bank account who needs to refinance their mortgage after a free vacation and consolidating their credit cards to save money on enhancement medicine and mail order prescriptions and give money to the fake police/sick kid/religious/etc find after you pay the massive tax debt you didn't know you had with the help of Microsoft technical support.

Best app! The best app for blocking phone number. The first time I used it, it didn't work. But finally I figure out how to make it works. After you add the number on the "call filter" or the blocked list, tap the number and choose "read more". It will tell you the location of the spammer. Choose "spam" and the app will block this person. If this doesn't work then go to the "search", put the phone number again and tap "search". This also will give you the spammer's location. Then choose "spam" and this app will block this person. It will take a while to do this but trust me it works. Hope it helps :)

Nice app You don't really need this app if all you want to do is silence unwanted callers while leaving your ringer on. You can create a contact, say "Blocked," and then add spam callers to this contact. You can then turn off the ring for this contact in your phone settings (iPhone). The phone still lights up when a spammer is calling you, but if you need to leave the ringer on for important calls and don't want to be bothered with spam, this is a solution. It's sad that it's so easy to get away with spamming numbers on the DNC list.

The best for seeing who called Over the years I've looked for some way to be able to identify a phone number before calling back, and always get brought to one of several sites offering that info for a fee. Came across this website (and then got the app) and was amazed to finally find a resource for finding out the name associated with a phone number that was quick, easy, accurate, and FREE! I don't use the spam blocker function so I've had no issues. I didn't mind putting in my number because I have no need to be anonymous when I call someone. For my needs, this app (and the website) are the best.

Great App Since my Mother's death 8 months ago I have been pestered with direct mailings wanting to help me dell het home. I know they got my address from the Orange County Probate file, ad I am the PR of her estate. Now the phone calls, with no ID have started. I used TrueCaller to ID the callers, id them as SPAM since a little bit of reading would have told the Jerks the house could not be sold until my sister also passes, therefore I copied the info and paced it on my FB page with a Public Audience and a description of the cursing at me when I told the Jerk to leave me alone and remove my name snd address from his list. I will continue to use TrueCaller to ID and warn others of the Jerks.

used to be a good resource This used to be a good resource for looking up unrecognized numbers before I decided to block them.  I don't answer any unrecognized numbers or ones with no caller ID that I recognize so I don't want True Caller deciding who to block....leave the control at my fingertips to manage please.

This has worked great This app has been a blessing. I have to make sure I update the app to keep the spam list updated, but I also have to do my part and report spam when it gets through their filter.  I saw someone ranting about how horrible it is -  I had to make sure to go into my settings and allow the app to access my calls to filter them as they came in..... and that's been wonderful. Most of my spam calls are caught by this app and then I can block them.  There are some that do get through without a warning.  I will copy and search that phone number in tru callers database and add it if necessary .

Wonderful, helpful app! This app is truly a lifesaver. It does exactly what it says it will do in a very simple, straight forward way. Most apps that have in-app purchases are pretty handicapped and constantly bug you to purchase the full package. This one is fully functional, doesn't constantly harass you and doesn't seem to be spying on you. That is exactly why I want to eventually become a "full subscriber". I wish more apps did this. When I see the in-app purchase thing, I automatically assume it pretty much has minimal functionality and will just spam me.

Used to work good but now it doesn't This app when I first downloaded it it worked very well in blocking a bunch of fake pharmaceutical callers from India using American phone numbers from New York to California. I Have been running this for over a year. Now it seems that it doesn't really block anything and the update download takes forever where it used to just take a few seconds. It's very cumbersome to copy the numbers and then go search for it to find out that it is indeed the same pharmaceutical outfit based in India. Had I reviewed this when I first got it I would've given it five stars however now I'm giving it one because it no longer functions correctly.

Beware: Personal information might become public I initially bought into the hype that this app would be able to help you screen spam calls.  Surprisingly enough, a month or so after I signed up I received an unprecedented number of calls from unknown numbers, most of them indeed registered as spam on truecaller.

True caller review I have used true caller since a friend recommended it.  For the most part I am very happy with it. You have to update all the time, but not a problem, doesn't take much time. I even have used it to look up landline fishy numbers & ones that appear to be robo-calls.  I don't like the fact that it wants permission to use my contact list, but it gives me an option & it is totally up to me.  If people are in my contacts, their names come up automatically, true caller does not need access nor will they get access to my contacts list.    Other then that, they have earned 5 stars in my book. Thanks for this free service true caller.

Wow... So I downloaded this app not thinking too much of it because every single one that I've used so far it will only show some numbers the rest it will just say cellular but this one actually shows ones that have already been reported just if it's not listed it'll tell you that it's most likely spam and you can block contact straight from the app and it will pop up on your phone if it is a sales call I would recommend this app if you get a lot of sales calls or wrong numbers all in all I'm pretty impressed but please mind the grammar errors I'm using talk to text

Soon to be history With the use of "True Caller" and another App "YouMail" I am the one smiling each time these Scammers, Telemarketers,ECT  call me! Great job " True Caller".  I honestly was not thrilled about giving my info to get info, as I see is also a main gripe of others.  Building a database is a very long and tedious adventure, especially when setting out to target A CERTAIN GROUP OR GROUPS OF CALLERS. We hopefully are all using the "True Caller" for the same reasons, to put an end to the annoying callers that leave no message, or trying to sell you the world, and blah,blah,blah. Small sacrifice to add my number to hundred of thousands of others.

A Complete Surprise. I expected very little from this app. I had tried many similar apps prior to using Truecaller and they were all complete disappointments. But to my surprise Truecaller is extremely good. It just works. It is very simple and easy to use and it isn't cluttered with unnecessary  features that only help to annoy you. I have nothing bad to say about this app and recommend it to anyone looking for a good caller ID app with the ability to lookup phone numbers and get detailed information about the owner of whatever number you look up. Truecaller deserves a strong 5 Stars.

Installed on iPhone 6 plus works great I had this app when I had my iPhone 4G and it found almost 200 numbers that were spam. It didn't give me any additional information about the number. However, now I have the iPhone 6 plus , have higher version of IOS and I updated the app per the notification received in the App Store under update/update all , then I inputted a phone number that has been bugging me everyday for the last week.

IAP done right. Other developers need to take note. Truecaller allows you to gain IAP using offer walls / watching advertisement videos. This is the way all IAP should be handled. It gives people a choice, and it allows them to generate ad revenue for the developer (useful for kids who don't have access to their mom's credit card).

I don't understand Before I ever download a app I always look at the reviews an I have been getting non-stop calls from 1-800, 1-888, an now #'s from out of the country it's really weird so I searched on here caller id app or caller id an I looked at a lot an this one had the most great reviews so I downloaded it an did everything it said to do copy an paste the #'s waited for the info to come up an 4 out of 5 said we have the information umm okay I'm ready for it yeap never got it idk if I'm suppose to pay for it or what but yea an the one that didn't say they had info on the # said there is nothing about that #, so I'm uninstalling an I will just block the #'s that idk, oh how I wish I had my Galaxy 6 Edge but my kids wanted me to be "cool" an get the iPhone 6 oh I'm feeling cool now....

20 bad calls to just 1 or 2 Spam calls are annoying as we all know, this app changed my daily phone calls from 20 spams a day to just one or 2. I try to update my spam list every few days so it has the new numbers.
Need to Know ‚Ä¢ Best app I have used so far. It lets me know if a caller is spam and what type (scam, subscription, car trade, etc)
An Essential Application Truecaller is by far one of the most important apps anyone can install for the following reasons:

Pro Subcription Service Hidden Limitation Bought a pro subscription which works on one iPhone but I have more than one iPhone and there's no way to get additional subscriptions - it only allows transfer of the existing subscription to the 2nd phone while removing the subscription on the first phone. Wrote to customer service and they said to create a new profile on the 2nd phone which still doesn't allow for purchasing a 2nd subscription. Than they said I would have to create a 2nd iTunes Account to get a 2nd subscription - unacceptable. When I purchased the subscription, it didn't note that it only covered one phone; in fact, it should cover all phones under the one ITunes account.  If not, they should state up front that a pro subscription only covers one phone.  Uninformed customer service as well.

It actual does work When the call is coming in you have to screen shot it and it will give you the name of the caller . Look at the video . Hands down you guys kill it. I can't believe it I have this number calling for months and sending fu.. up message, I try everything in my hands to find the name of the person, ok caller Google, Facebook and probably more than 20 others sites, but my sister tell me about this app, I download it and in less than 2 minutes I get the name of the person who was calling and texting hahaha it was a ex who can keep on living his live üí© and think is funny to call me and text me every day. But the point is that this app is awesome.
Helpful app!! Great app! Detects call as its coming in and IDs it as spam so you don't have to answer.

Great App but I have only 1 complaint. The app itself works great! It has identified a lot of spam callers. My complaint, and if fixed will get 5 stars, is that EVERY time the list is updated it resets the custom ring & text tone I have set back to the defaults. So I am not bothered by the unwanted calls, for the True Caller contact, I have turned off the vibration for both the ringer & texts and I have set the text tone to none & have added a special "silent" ring tone which plays 10 seconds of silence. After every update I have to change these again from the default. It's not a deal breaker but it is annoying.

Thank God My phone number is listed due to my business and it rings constantly. Had to quit answering my phone a year ago. I hate not knowing is missed calls are legitimate and gave had to depend on voicemail to make that determination. I like that I can verify the identity of callers before interacting on a business level. As a retired police officer I'm so much more confident doing my homework before interacting with strangers. Having tried to use reverse 411 sites I have ended up with my cc being charged beyond a one time look up etc...

Identified a number other apps couldn't! I was able to identify a cell number other apps were unable to find. Haven't been able to get the name search to pull up any results I was looking for (not even of people's I already knew...didn't even locate that person in the correct state). It does seem to work good for searching by number, but then again I was asked to rate this app only after it returned just one result! I searched my own number and it only returned the false name I used when signing up...John Doe!

Worthless - less than worthless In order for this to work YOU have to first receive a spam call, then you enter the number and Truecaller says "oh, yeah, 300 other people have reported this as a spammer".  Geez, if so many have ALREADY reported it as spam why do I have to report it?  Why don't YOU just red flag it so I don't bother answering it in the first place?

OMG they track all your calls and contacts! I was excited to install this on my SE after iOS 10 came out. But it wasn't useful cuz spammers use apps like this and also Hiya and others to find ways around them. I still got tons of spam calls that were not identified- even after I allowed TrueCaller to place a HUGE contact entry called SPAM in the Contacts app.

So far hasn't worked This will be day number 3 using it. Before: at about 15 spam calls a day for last month. Been blocking them all as they come in. Doesn't work, always new numbers. Reported all of them from my call list to Truecaller and they were all known spam. Great. There's hope. Now: Still get just as many, report, report, they all are known on Truecaller. It has done nothing to block them. I have had one red screen come up telling me the call was spam, but it didn't block it. So far this app is pointless, unless you want to quickly do the reverse lookup and be sure it's a spam call, which I can figure out myself. Will give it a few more days to step up and work. Doubtful, need a new solution to this problem.

Awesome Thanks to TrueCaller I have identified over 400 spam calls.  I'm a busy man I don't have time to waste on phone calls that waste my time but then again if I don't recognize the number I usually don't answer it but everyone that I've received that I don't know has turned out to be spam great app if you don't have it you might as well throw your phone in the ocean or be bothered with the constant barrage of spam phone calls because there's a lot of evil people in the world "true caller" wants to help you identify them just get the app it's free!!!

Scam The app belligerently and consistently asks you, via fast & furious pop-ups, for your personal contact info, bribing you! The idea is for the developer to build up their database (little black book) which has about 9 people recorded, no doubt.

Works great but needs a few more improvements Says "not connected to internet" at times and the twitter option does not work, my contacts update perfectly fine tho, filling in missing information and pictures and searching to find out a unknown caller works fantastic. I Believe with a little bit of work this app can be the next big thing to ever hit the app store. Sure it asks for some information, but remember, this is a caller Id app, meaning it helps identify who is calling you, so it needs you number to go into the database.

Omg 5/5 I have a knack for avoiding 99% of people who have my number. I recently broke my phone, so that led me to switching over to one that doesn't have anyone's number saved. Oh no! How will I know which calls to avoid and which to answer? Surely, out of my hundred + contacts the three people I actually talk to would be affronted if I ignored them, too. This app is wonderful in that I can now block every person I don't feel like talking to with confidence that it's the right number :) crisis averted. Thanks, TrueCaller.

Works great and getting better! I don't like answering the phone unless I know who it is. With this app I can almost always find out...I say almost because I have had a few numbers that the app couldn't pull up, but the database is always growing so that's good! One thing though, it would be nice if the app could automatically pull up the number without having to put it manually. I usually forget the number half way through putting it in... Anyway, keep up the good work!

Awesome App Keeps me from getting a lot of spam calls. I can add to the list too instead of making my block caller list on my iPhone a million miles long. I've had the same number for about 10 years now. In that amount of time, there's no way to keep it out of the hands of people trying to sell you everything under the sun. This app keeps me ahead of them and puts them on the spam list before I get the chance to block them. Very useful.

Good App, Wish It Were Free! I like this app much better than the free MrNumber! I spent over an hour deleting labels from my contacts app after discovering that MrNumber has added HUNDREDS of labels I didn't even know we're there, and this was all AFTER I'd deleted the app from my phone. This app still looks up numbers for you, & you can still find spam. There are ads, but I still wish it were free, hence the four stars rather than five. It would be nice if they'd block calls, but apparently that has something to do with Apple & iPhone.

Would be five but.... I have Been a loyal truecaller user since I had my Nokia 5230 nuron. In the latest update, I was trying to search numbers that I don't recognize by the copy and scroll down to the widget function it keeps saying no name found. I then said, Maybe it's because the number doesn't exist but then I searched a number that's in my contacts and it again said no name found. This is really annoying and I would love to be a faithful truecaller user but I can't do that because of this recent update. Please fix!!!

I feel used. I get a lot of spam calls and have been diligently reporting the numbers to the app database for perhaps a year. But I always wondered: why didn't app stop these calls? And how many spam calls is the app really preventing from reaching me? Does the phone simply block those calls without ringing? Then about two days ago, I received a call which made my screen bright red; the caller was identified as spam; this was the first and only such call I have received with a red screen warning. Question answered! One identified spammer in a year! Yet in return, the app has all of my contacts in a data base. So unless I am clueless--and my gifted IQ suggests otherwise--I suspect this app is at best almost useless and at worst violating my privacy.

This app has really been great I think I took over a phone number from either a small business or just a very popular person so I was getting a lot of unwanted calls. I was also getting spam calls as well which made it hard to differentiate between innocent callers just looking for the wrong person and someone trying to sell me something. With a little effort this app has greatly reduced the unwanted calls. Thank you so much!

What happens when a number is reported? I get that blocking a number keeps it from calling me, and likely shares it with the rest of the TrueCaller community. But do any of these numbers get reported to the providers to stop them? For example, I had a spam caller seem to come from a local insurance provider. I happened to call them when I looked it up on your system and noticed it was for my farmers insurance agent. They were unaware that there number was being used for SPAM, so how does a misuse the number get taken care of? It seems that if you're providing this wonderful service, that you guys should be double checking in making sure that the phone companies are alerted to the fact that their numbers are being Misused.

WOW!! Believe me when I say this is the Best App available. Every app I have tried doesn't even compare.. I can identity who is calling and block, spam, annoying people who call non stop all day long and never leave a message.

True Caller I love this App. It works great and does exactly what it claims to do. I've had this App for 6+ months & I highly recommend it for everyone. ",But"the only complaint is very minute but aggravating to me because I'm a perfectionist, lol! I can't correct the "Country" in my profile plus this issue isn't listed in the FAQ. I don't know how it got on there so I added my Country in my address section while the wrong one is still there. In "Edit" it doesn't have an "x"to tap to remove the mistake. I know it's petty but annoying.

Consent to Use of Data You further agree and guarantee that, if You have opted in to participate in the Enhanced Search functionality, we may collect, use and share certain information regarding the contacts contained in Your device‚Äôs phone book (‚ÄúContact Information‚Äù) with other Users in accordance with the Truecaller Privacy Policy in order to provide the Services. By allowing Contact Information to be collected, You give Truecaller a right to use that Contact Information as a part of the Service and you guarantee that you have any and all permissions required to share such Contact Information with us. You may opt-out to prevent the sharing of Contact Information at any time.

Use to be useful Well previous version use to tell you that a call was scam or spam when you received the call if the caller had been recognized previously by anyone using trucaller. Now it doesn't. You don't know the call is spam or scam until you look up the call after receiving it. It seems to use it best you just don't answer your calls then you check to see if you should or shouldn't have answered. It would make more sense to let you know when the call is coming in. This way you could catch maybe an important call with a number unfamiliar to you. Also I don't think the Pro version is actually worth it. Save your money. Trucaller you have work to do.

This App Works! If you follow the setup instructions this app does exactly what it says it does and helps eliminate Spam calls. If you get a call from a number you don't recognize, then enter the number into the search function it will determine whether it is Spam, a robo-call or a legit business.
UNtrue caller Everything it claims to do it doesn't!  Its self proclaimed "SUPER-POWERFUL CALLER ID APP". Is in fact not !!
It's almost what we would want I love what it does, but i am left wishing it would do more.

Works as long as the caller IS a Spammer Since anyone can add any number as a "Spam" caller, I am careful about immediately identifying a particular number. That said, True Caller has a very nice "Search" number feature where you can perform a Google search to see what others have said. Also, it's great to see the number of others who report a particular number. I've shared this app with several friends. Easy to use, and does a great job of screening those incoming calls as long as you perform regular updates.

I don't understand the positive reviews So I've been getting a fair amount of spam calls. A friend told me about this app tried it got to say doesn't work. Not only does the app never update on its on you have to go into the app then click update to update the list of spam callers. Not only that it still let's spam calls through without identifying it as spam. I've got the app fully integrated into my iPhone 7+ it seems all my calls as a matter of fact when I copy a number then go into try caller it asks if I want to search this number. It searches identifies it as spam but never identifies the number while it's actually calling. Good idea poor execution on this app.

Frustrating results... It seems that every day I see more calls from robocallers or automated systems.  Nearly every time I go into the app, it seems the app is "disabled" and not working.  Is this apple or is it the app?  why does it keep happening?   Is there a way to notify us that it has changed?

If only I could give it 10 stars! I posted some items on craigslist. I checked the little box that said I didn't want to be contacted by others. That did not stop the spammers. What has stopped them and stunned them is when I can reply to them with their name and their location. I love this app! I'll be sending out an email shortly to all my friends and family to tell them about it and posting it on my Facebook.

Truecaller is good This app just works. If you receive a call from a number you don't know, you just copy the number from your Recent list and open the app. When the app opens it asks you if you want info on the number you copied. It then gives the information on the number. If it hasn't already been listed as spam, but you feel it is you can designate it as such. Great and intuitive UI. Get it!

Best App for 'Unknown' Callers, Spam When I first downloaded the app I couldn't get the main feature to work (I.e., could not create a new contact and auto-insert their database of known spammers). But everything is working now.

Finds immediately Been getting bs calls for almost 6 months. We will see how it works out if they continue to call. I have them all blocked, but spammers seem to always find a way around things. They have continued to call me from different numbers, but they are local numbers for the most part, and when I pick up the phone no one is ever on the other end, so I am hopeful this app helps!

Worse than useless Doesn't tell you in description, but this app does not display any spam warning on phone before answering. But you can look up the number after answering the call and find out that 700 people reported it to True Caller as spam. Useless!  This was the whole reason for installing this app. My frequency of spam calls has increased since installing this app. Worse than useless!  The online forums indicate that no anti-spam calling app is going to work during the call because Apple restricts app access to the phone and contacts. This app is a big piece of false advertising, and is likely selling your phone number. Avoid like the plague.

Helped me find a dogs home There is truth to what people are saying, it does have work to be done BUT what is does is wonderful. The other day a dog got loose and the tags had a number that wasn't going through. The app made it so i could get a name for the number and used the lookup to find the address he came from. This app literally made it to a dog could go back to his family, after his actual owner had just died

Insecure in Nature/Only For Extreme Spam Victims The unfortunate truth to the download and use of this app is that in began to receive more spam calls than I had before. The app requires your phone number. The very thing we're trying to keep secret in order to use the app once they have your number it's uploaded to a database in the cloud all of a sudden becoming a lot more susceptible to theft. This company like many companies has already had a number of accounts and their numbers stolen. If prior to this app you were experiencing severe spam calls this app is great if you were hardly receiving any spam, then you're better off not getting it.

Pretty accurate ! Works way better than any paid reverse phone search app !! Very reliable . Liking this !! This app work much better than any paid reverse phone number search app out there!! Also the new version gives you a score on how high the caller is rated in a spam caller scale , which really helps as some times it's hard to identify those numbers from their " looks " !

App collects too much data I grew uncomfortable after reading other users reviews about spam increasing after install - after scouring google and reading through the privacy policy and TOS I'm fully uncomfortable with this app.  It not only collects data on you such as geo-location, SIM-card usage and WAY more, but any information you provide of a friend (syncing your contacts) assumes your friend is fully aware of this data collection and proceeds with full immunity.  Not only that simply deleting the app won't fix the problem (account must be deacivated, located in the "about" section - at least I HOPE this solves it).  Stay away, this is not an honest setup

Love it! Upon installing Truecaller the number of spam calls immediately dropped! I was also able to go back in my call history & see what numbers were from spam callers & block them. I can even reverse look up numbers, sometimes it shows who called, or you can report it. I haven't had any ad problems or other issues. I have been recommending the app to friends & family. Thanks!

Horrible I downloaded and registered months ago. Quickly learned that it does not work and deleted the app from my phone. About a week ago I started getting these blocked calls thru Truecaller. I made sure the app is not on my phone and removed my number from their registry. But I continue to receive these "Blocked By Truecaller" calls at all hours of the day and night. Best part is when I answer they hang up. I tried to find a solution on the Truecaller website and tried to find a way to contact Truecaller but I was unsuccessful. I'm tired of be woken up by Truecaller every single morning! And 11 times throughout the day!

EXCELLENT***** I don't usually take the time to review something-anything.  Well, I just have to because this app is incredible!  It does everything I want it to!  At least I can identify who called me afterward.  I just don't answer any #'s I don't have in my contacts list.  They can call:leave a message:I'll return the call if I feel it's needed.  But a lot of these spammers, etc leave nothing.  Now I can look up the number then BLOCK IT FOREVER!

A very helpful app! I can identify the numbers of all of my friends & family. I can identify those that I do business with. For any number who calls & doesn't leave a message or any that are just the number without a name, those are the ones I check with Truecaller. Many times I'll find out through Truecaller that they were spam calls or sales calls. This is a great tool!

Great app! Love this app. I recently found out that the number I have now is a recycled number so I get random calls from people that I don't even know! True caller has a widget that when someone calls (and you don't have their number saved) , a caller id pops up with their info already. Also love the fact that you can block any numbers that are already reported as spam! This is a must get!

It works good I just like to confirm the numbers it classifieds as Spam its actually spam. And not a number you might be blocking from a friend thats not in your contacts. But it works. Blocking someone its easy if you have a smart phone.

Very glad I hqve this app I get a lotof spam callers and sometimes its hard to know if they are or not. This app makes it so easy to find out by coping it but the when you open the app you dont have to paste it cause it does it for you to let you know fast. I also like the option to put as spam or not and you can even share it with other people that it's spam. Overall I'm very happy with this app

Great help stopping spam Not perfect, but they are trying hard to help stop spammers getting to you. They do their best update numbers constantly, which can't be easy.    That's the only reason I say "not perfect" because no matter what you will either have a new number coming up all the time trying to scam you, or scammers block their caller id's.  But you can submit new numbers to help stop them

Information stealer app! Beware ! Spam call enhancer app!! Big big mistake to use it. For a time I didn't give it permission to access my contacts and everything was fine. After I gave it access, suddenly it knew everyone in my phone book and starts making associations like Facebook... A is connected to b is connected to c... And presents them to me! Unbelievable!

Great App - needs a couple small tweaks I love your app and the "crowd" sourced way of collectively blocking spam calls.  Please update the app to NOT change the ringtone / vibration pattern back to the default values whenever I update the spam list.  I have a ringtone that is silence so that the phone won't ring or vibrate when a spammer calls me - but every time I get the updated list thru the app, you change my settings for the "Identified as Spam" contact.  Please don't do that!

Slightly helpful I appreciate that TrueCaller shows me which numbers are spam and often shows me that the number is spam while my phone is ringing so I don't bother answering. But I wish it'd block the spam calls in the first place, and I'm unsure why it doesn't, since I enabled the app to block calls. Their library does seem to have about 2/3 of the spam numbers that call me, and often when I report a new number, they're already starting to get reports about a new spam number and it will be blocked soon.

Good App I got the app to block unwanted calls from telemarketers and other annoying types. It does show a "Protected by TrueCaller" screen when a call from my list of unwanted callers comes in. This is helpful, but what would be amazing is not just the pop-up, but making the caller think my number was no longer in service. Barring that, sending the unwanted caller a fax machine tone might be good.

Worst app ever Worst app ever. I was looking for a last resort to block my number from spammers and stalkers, but rather this app did not block callers I submitted, in fact it blocked callers I did not input to block (my family & other frequent callers). I wish I never downloaded this App as I now fear my I info, as well as my contacts info will be broadcasted over this app. I feel violated! And now I'm having issues sending/receiving messages to these contacts I never wanted blocked in the first place! I have no idea why these rating are so high. If u search the app over web they have ton of consumer complains. BEWARE! Complete violation of privacy.
Coolest directory ever World telephone directory in your palm... What a cool concept!!!

I can't believe it actually worked I can't even explain how much wasted time I've spent online trying to find out who had called me, only to find out...after entering a LOT of info...that I'd have to pay for the search results. Made me furious. This app is almost too good to be true. I typed in the number and was immediately given the caller's first and last name. Crazy good app. üòÉ

Awesome app! I've been waiting for an important phone call...of course the one moment I was away from my phone, a call came in and I missed it. I called the number back and it said the number was disconnected...paranoia set in at this point. Plugged the number into this app and it immediately informed me that the number was simply more telemarketing crapola that's flying around more frequently. Phew! Crisis averted, anxiety resolved!!

Identifies Incoming calls üëç This app identifies incoming calls about 99% of the time. I really like it because sometimes I get bothered by telemarketers but I won't know it's them till they call. Crashes My Phone I really need this app right now, because I've been getting so many spam calls lately. fix fix fix You have a big problem in your system !!!

Must have app!! Since the iOS 10.1 update this app is a must have for all iPhones. Seems better hat similar apps that require payments to get full functionality too. Do not Download Beware!!! As soon as I deleted the app I started getting tons and tons of spam calls multiple times a day. Great App I use this all the time and have had great results. Unexpected benefits It just dawned upon me that I haven't gotten spam calls in months, and as a realtor they are quite common.... This ap is AWESOME. I didn't even know that feature was part of this program until I found a contact in my phone today named "identified as spam" with at least 50 numbers under it. Again, I'm beyond pleased.
