Not too bad This app does mainly what it says it does. It will give you the name on the account as long as it is a contract phone. But when it comes to providing a name on pre-paid cell phone numbers, it's just like the rest, unable to comply. Is this a reason to uninstall? Definitely not. I will continue to use this app. And hopefully soon, there will be an update that provides users with names associated with pre-paid numbers.

Useful & Effective For some reason, I started getting a lot of spam phone calls. I would ignore and block the numbers, but I would keep getting more calls from new numbers anyways. I lucked out and found this app, and my phone has finally calmed down. I don't really get spam calls anymore, and when I do get one once in awhile, I just report it to the app.

Hope they use these reports I hope they use the info gathered in this app to figure out who these scammers are I still get calls every day they just harass or try to defraud ppl I registered on Do not Call years ago it seems like I just get more spam calls after doing that. This app at least mutes the calls from repeat spammers and easily let's u look up & report new ones.

A app worth getting This app is worth getting and to keep because if you get a call that is on the list the true caller app pops up instead of your normal answering way to let you know that the number is a spam number so you will not get suckered out of money or unwanted stuff that they will never send out to you so to me it is worth the weight in gold to get.

Worst App I Ever Installed!!! This App is awful & even after deleting it I cannot get it to go away. It's like a virus. Before installing the app I could block numbers via the native iOS abilities. Now this app took over & I have lost my ability to block numbers. Now spammers can call me over & over & this app makes the call notification screen angry red with SPAM written on it but there is no way to stop the calls. I deleted the app & it still flags calls & I still cannot block numbers. I requested help from the developer & got no reply. This app needs to be removed from the App Store as it is a virus!!!!

Buggy and inconsistent The app worked for a couple of days and then suddenly stopped identifying callers. The problem is that the app works by keeping a list of known bad numbers and that list is not dynamic. Since spammers constantly change their numbers it's easy to outsmart the app. Furthermore the widget often fails to identify the number so you always have to go to the app and then often it knows the number is bad but it should have identified the number in the caller screen! It seems there are no good apps yet in this field.

Great App! Prior to installing this App I was inundated with Spam calls. Now I am virtually Spam call free!! I can't thank the developers enough for what they've done and the peace of mind they have given me. The only negative thing I have to say about the App is that it has taken away my ability to mess with the Spammers by giving them incorrect answers and using their accents back at them. LOL. Five stars for this App.

Finally- a way to tackle spammers! Truecaller helps get spam calls under control by checking incoming calls against a spam database. After you receive a call from a spammer (which it flags), Truecaller blocks that number. The only reason I rated it 4 stars instead of 5 is because the database isn't 100 percent complete and occasionally a call will slip through. You need to make sure the database is up to date regularly.
Knock Your Sox Off! I've only had this app for a couple of weeks and it has already alerted me that a caller number on my iPhone is a known scam!

Stalker Identification! I got this app recently, and used it today to help a friend who was being stalked by an ex. She had blocked the stalker's phone number months ago, but a few days ago, she started getting calls at all hours from an unknown number. I put the number into the app, and BINGO-- up came the name of her ex, who has gotten a new number! Now that number is blocked, too!
Very useful I'm always getting all types of callers selling something on my cell phone and it gets very annoying.

I highly recommend this app. This app is essential to any phone. There are thousands and thousands of scam artists calling on store shelf phones, buying minutes, calling innocent people to steal their money. Trucaller is you first line of defense. It tells you right away if it's a scam call. You can also add new ones. It has saved me many times already. I highly recommend it.

Just Okay The ap DOES identify spam calls, but that is all. It doesn't block them, in fact, it essentially disables the call blocking on my iPhone. True Caller just turns the screen red and identifies the call as spam. Numbers are added to a single Contact in your phone book, but the calls still come through. And, you have to manually update the list, which is sort of stupid. The ap should at leSt have the option to completely block calls.

Finally a Way to Cut Down on Spam Calls The Do Not Call List only had any luck with legitimate organizations. The truly nefarious players could care less about DNC, and the number of prosecutions under it was paltry at best. With TruCaller to offenders may get through once, but only once. Once identified you can block them and report them to keep them from annoying you and notifying your fellow TC app users of the bad players.

Excellent I'm really looking this App. My junk call rate has dropped dramatically, and if any get through they are labeled "spam" right on the screen. Otherwise I the App is never in the way or popping up asking something from me. It's entirely invisible until it works.

It works well, but drains battery This app works well and blocked all spam calls. The trade off is a decrease of 25% battery loss in the course of 8 hours. I'm used to going to bed at say 90% battery, waking up and it's at 88%. With this app I'd wake up and it'd be at say 75%. Woah!!! I had felt like I was charging my phone more often and after I deleted this app everything was fine again. It's really disappointing because this app does block spam calls very well. But since I only get a few every week a decrease in battery is not worth it to me.

Does not automatically block call Truecaller app identifies a spam incoming call but does nothing about it. it does not add the number to My Blocked Calls list. it does not even provide a button to add the identified call to my list. i have to bring up the app, go to the more>My Blocked Calls list, hit the + , type in the number and hit done.

Pretty Awesome I love this app.! When I get strange Numbers it can immediately gives me a pretty accurate account of the location of the call and ways to find out who the number belongs too! Spam Not only did the app not work, but it also spammed my phone. It added a contact to my phone called "identified spam callers." Great app for identifying spamming I really like this so for identifying spam calls. At first I found it a little clunky to use but now you can copy numbers from your recent call to find out who a number is. That feature made all the difference for me.

One of my favorite apps Initially I thought meh...it'll get better and it did...a little. Then more progress - and then more and now...I use it daily! I love it that it's ad free and fast! Terrific!!! This app identifies callers and also identifies spam callers and maintains a block caller list on your phone for spammers. Three occasions this app has hit it right dead on. Skeptical at first... I didn't want anything other than a way to combat the mass amounts of robocalls I receive. I thought this would be too involved for what I wanted, but it just created a contact with tons of known spammers. Took a total of 5 minutes.

Quick way to stop annoying calls Keep app running and rarely need to pick up a call to find its Windows or the IRS or any other kind of spam/scam call.  Find a number that slipped by? Just search it and report it.  As an added benefit it creates an Identified as Spam contact with the numbers. Very happy to cut down those annoying spam calls! I am really impressed at how few calls I get now from robo-call centers, fake numbers and rip-off artists. Not useful Just like everyone has been saying, it doesn't automatically blocked the spam calls for you, so you need to manually add it to the block list, which defeat the whole purpose of having this app. It also don't recognize the spam call most of the time, even though sometimes the number is actually already exists in their database.

Works okay I was skeptical at first, but after using this for two months, I've noticed a significant decrease in telemarketing calls. Before I got the app, I was getting 10 calls a day from spammers and now I get about 1 or 2. So, this app has definitely cut down telemarketing traffic.

Very Poorly designed! This app is actually counterproductive. It doesn't block nuisance calls despite being able to identify them! Nothing secure about it. TrueCaller accesses all your contacts names, numbers, emails, device info, location, inbound and outbound call logs with times and durations, all SMS messages, allows itself to record audio, view wifi info, download stuff without notification, read calendar events plus associated confidential info.
